p: The composition and content of the EOs of P. eldarica may differ depending on the area where these pines are grown. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first study to analyze the EOs from the needles, bark, and pollen of the P. eldarica grown in northwestern Iran. The present study was designed to elucidate the chemical profile and antimicrobial activity of these EOs. With growing interest surrounding the use of EOs in the pharmaceutical industry, the results of this study may reveal a new horizon for the development of new pharmaceutical products.
